title: Imagine if riot implementeda delay system to zed
body: Or any other champion really. Lb feels AWFUL on equal footing to any assassin. Like absolute ass. Being forced to wait to deal damage is fucking horrifying.l Especially into an adc with lifetseal. Gl lul

replies.body:
Delays are built into quite a few assassins.

Zed as a delay (have to wait on Ult, and time damage to be successful).
Fizz has a delay (have to wait on W).
Evelynn has a delay (Q is spaced out, W requires time to activate).
Ekko has a delay (has to wait for ult to get into the fight for full burst)

I actually disagree bc generally zed doesn't have to wait for anything to use weq combo auto ignite for a pretty much guaranteed death. Sure his r has some sort of delay, yet he is extremely safe while doing it. Have you ever waited so long for your e chain on lb to activate passive that your w timed out? Good lord. Now that's an overkill on delay
Fizz, correct me if I'm wrong, but if fizz hits you with chum the waters his w doesn't need a timer.
Evelynn's cook timers is fucking atrocious
Ekko doesn't quite have a delay unless he wants guaranteed safety
Like the delay on Death Mark?
Zed already has a delay system. His ult is delayed. I agree tho that the delays in LB are bad. It doesn't feel like there's any more counterplay in lane, she just kills you slightly more slowly.

While Zed has delays, they are in a very outdated form. Zed is first untargetable, than can cast his combo in no-time, and than just blinks away. Early in the game he might need to use more than one auto to kill his target, giving those delays actual meaning, but most of the time he doesn't need to spend even half a second near his victim to earn the kill.

It's nothing like newer/reworked assassin kits.

> Imagine if riot implementeda delay system to zed

He already has one? Wtf even is this thread?
a delay system *LIKE* the recent assassin reworks/? Where he has to wait a certain amount of time to do significant damage for "reaction time"

No, we need to stop fucking over assassins and start adding ramp up time to Marksmen.


Its fucking ridiculous that they say LB or Talon burst too quickly, when you have people like Vayne, Twitch or Draven who do easily 2k burst within a second from range.


Assassins are a worthless role, the only reason Zed looks strong is because the other assassins have been spoonfed pure shit the last 2 seasons.

> he only reason Zed looks strong is because the other assassins have been spoonfed pure shit the last 2 seasons.

Zed isnt even good. {{champion:91}} is the posterchild for assassins currently
zed is not even the strongest assassin

You mean like if his ult didn't deal damage until a few seconds after it was cast? Or if Fizz's W didn't deal much damage unless you waited a bit after you damage them to use it? Or if Talon had to hit the enemy with 3 abilities and then autoattack?
